main.name: Samuel Stentz
main.description: Avid data analyst and software developer looking to learn and make an impact
main.bio: My favorite work involves developing a product or tool which helps others. I often gravitate toward healthcare, education, and social issues for this reason. I have experience with Python (Pytorch, Tensorflow, Numpy, Scipy, Sklearn), JS (React, D3), Java, R, Matlab. I'm always keen to explore new concepts and learn. In my free time I'm a hiker, biker, rockclimber, and racket sports player.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out if you have any questions, want to partner on something, or just have a cool idea!

education.description: Undergraduate Computer Science degree with a focus on articial intelligence and modelling. Member of Grand Challenges LLC. Previous Analyst Team Lead for Big Data Club.

work.title: Software Engineering Intern
work.description: Worked on internal tooling team. Implemented webapp to visualize key patient analysis decisions. Used react, cytoscape, and flask for webdev, and git to contribute to a production codebase.

work.title: Computational Analyst Intern
work.description: Designed and implemented Graph Convolutional Neural Network in Tensorflow to model enzyme specificity. Applied ML experience, including Slurm workload manager for parallelizing pipeline.

projects.title: Plotting by Time
projects.category: See examples of cities where everything is seperated by the metric we care about, travel time!
